attributes.action: hold a referendum on his candidacy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since none of us actually voted for him, it is undemocratic for him to place himself in power without consulting the will of the people.

We are not calling for him to resign, merely to consult the public on whether or not they are in agreement with him being the new Prime Minister. Since we voted for Tony Blair, in a true democratic society we should have a say on who should be his successor.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
